title: Rogue Watchface free
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37- A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Rogue is the kind of watchface that will get you on the radar of fashion fanatics. It is a techy watchface that looks like a radar and even scans and beeps like a radar. It makes you feel like you are on a secret military mission and even catches every eye that passes by. The light beam circulating on the outer edge displays seconds and the time is shown in middle of the watch in numbers along with the date.FrillRoid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Digital military radar design.• Glow design with dark background.• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for round/circular smart watches such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG G WATCH R and LG watch Urbane. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Rogue is the kind of watchface that will get you on the radar of fashion fanatics. It is a techy watchface that looks like a radar and even scans and beeps like a radar. It makes you feel like you are on a secret military mission and even catches every eye that passes by.
The light beam circulating on the outer edge displays seconds and the time is shown in middle of the watch in numbers along with the date.
FrillRoid Watch Faces focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.
Key custom features:-

• Digital military radar design.
• Glow design with dark background.
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever
This watch face is for round/circular smart watches such as the Motorola Moto 360, LG G WATCH R and LG watch Urbane. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.
How it works?
It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Lame Interface on phone is in readable, cannot even tell what settings you can change if you were to get the "pro" version. Cannot even toggle a single setting in free version. Uninstalling.
Buggy Battery kept charging in reverse since I kept this watch face.kindly fix it.. Will give it 5 stars.
Great app Awesome in the Dark. Mission Impossible 15
